Class CodePrinter

 class CodePrinter
extends xtc.tree.Printer

Responsible for printing out pretty code.

Field Summary
private static java.io.OutputStreamWriter systemOutWriter
          Java doesn't like it when two things share Sysetm.out for stream writing, or something like that (only one stream was printing), so use a static guy to share it if the file can't be found.

Field Detail

systemOutWriter

private static java.io.OutputStreamWriter systemOutWriter
Java doesn't like it when two things share Sysetm.out for stream writing, or something like that (only one stream was printing), so use a static guy to share it if the file can't be found.

Constructor Detail

CodePrinter

private CodePrinter(java.io.Writer w)
This is not too important, because we're extending printer, but only allow construct from the factory method.

Method Detail

factory

public static CodePrinter factory(java.lang.String ext)
Sets up our printer. Attempts to get a file writer on outputFile, and if it fails, then it just defaults to writing to stdout. If it succeeds, then the file is destroyed and all the output goes into that file.

Parameters:
ext - The ext that the file being written should have. Typically, this will be "h" or "cpp".

print

public void print(CodeBlock block)
Given a block, adds it to the output.
